text: hpir'avnin kuttattarkalutaiyavum, avarkalukku munpu iruntavarkalutaiyavum nilaimaiyaip ponrateyakum; avarkalum (ivarkalaip polave tam) iraivanin vacanankalaip poyppittarkal - akave nam avarkalai avarkalutaiya pavankalin karanamaka alittom; innum hpir'avnin kuttattarai mulkatittom - avarkal anaivarum aniyayakkararkalaka iruntarkal
